attributes.action: sack all mps who have misleaded the british public over expenses.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The prime minister should make all mps who have misleaded the british taxpaying public resign if this was an ordinary member of public we would get done for fraud. sort it out.

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
